title: Sprint System Update (Mobile)
text: New mobile support, you just need to press once and it will automatically sprint and then press it again and you can run normally.

title: Sprint System Update
text: We have revised the entire animation sprint system so that everything now runs smoother and better, etc.

title: Alien Live Event & Update
text: A global countdown is now running and will hit zero on Saturday, 16.08.2025 at 18:00 (CEST). Only then will the brand-new 7-day live event begin.
